data.convo: Excuse me , does this bus go to the new bookstore ? No , you'll have to get off at the bank , and take a No . 50 . Thank you . How much is the fare to that stop ? One dollar . How many stops are there ? Two stops after this one . Could you please tell me when we get there ? Sure . By the way , do I need a transfer again after No . 50 ? No , a No . 50 will take you right there . Thank you .
